skins.shipDescription: Kagerou-class destroyer number twelve C Isokaze.
skins.selfIntroduction: I am Isokaze of DD17! In the past, you see, I've worked with Hamakaze, Urakaze, Tanikaze... oh, and Yukikaze! My service record stands second to none! And that's why you should put me in charge of your missions!
skins.acquisition: All units, attaaack! ...Wait a second, where am I?! Oh, I know you! Urakaze-sama said you're... the general! Hmph! I'm Isokaze, the one destined to become a general that will make the whole world tremble in fear!
skins.login: General! It's time to charge into battle!
skins.secretaryIdle1: General! Come play warring states with me! You can be... Ieyasu! I'll be Mitsunari!
skins.secretaryIdle2: Hamakaze! Tanikaze! Let's depart! We're heading for the capital!
skins.secretaryIdle3: Urakaze-sama, my coat has been torn again... Fix it for me!
skins.secretaryTouch: General, give me a piggyback ride! We must charge into the enemy stronghold!

skins.shipDescription: General, General, look! It's my New Year's outfit! Urakaze made it for me! Let's play a bunch of Sengoku wargames this year as well!
skins.acquisition: General, General, look! It's my New Year's outfit! Urakaze made it for me! Let's play a bunch of Sengoku wargames this year as well!
skins.details: General, I want my red envelope!
skins.secretaryIdle1: Woah! It's snowing! General, let's call everyone out and have a snowball fight!
skins.secretaryIdle2: Why is everyone so sluggish during the winter? I think playing in the snow is suuuuper fun!
skins.secretaryIdle3: General, General, look! It's a tiger! Rooooaarrr! Ahahaha~
skins.secretaryTouch: Huh? General, I'm not cold~ Ahaha, stop rubbing my belly, it tickles!
